TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewItemSelectionChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时的选择状态中的更改选择为已取消选择或取消选择为所选。The event occurs when the selection state of a changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected. 将不会出现处于虚拟模式。The will not occur if the is in virtual mode. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
